snippet.title: Engineered to Purpose Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
We're releasing a free demo for Steam NextFest! Check it out:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2199780/Engineered_To_Purpose/

Engineered To Purpose is a narratively-driven sci-fi tower defense game which allows players to design their own towers, customizing their attacks, targeting, and more. As pressure mounts, how you design your towers is just as crucial to success as how you use them in the field.
